title.en: Adolescence is a Sexual Excitement Period

description.en:
**JAP** Shishunki wa Hatsujouki
**ENG** Adolescence is a Sexual Excitement Period

A Volume of short stories involving the sexual experiences of young high school kids:

1. After School: Haruna, a tall first year girl on the volleyball team, is cleaning up after practice when her friend Akagi, who is much shorter than her, comes to help her finish up. As Akagi helps Haruna get over her anxiety about her height, they become more than friends...

2. After School 2: Haruna and Akagi meet up again after school, this time in the library. Akagi is asleep when Haruna gets there so she decides to try on his glasses. When Akagi wakes up he is overcome by her cuteness and they have some fun once again...

3. Studying Together: Sunae is ready to become a woman, and she stays up late at night to study seduction. Then she invites Shin to help her with her homework...

4. Lunch Break: Using her mouth, Eri is fooling around with Kou in a secluded area at school when they are almost caught by two other students during the lunch break. They get them to go away so they can continue their fun...

5. Summer Vacation Begins Tomorrow: Eri has gotten a little hairy down there and asks Kou to shave her in preparation for summer break. After he finishes the job Kou just can't help himself...

6. Nonstop! Kenmochi-sensei: A female teacher in her 20's, Kenmochi is in love with her student Inukai. When she ends up following him home after school she conducts "a special home visit" just for him...

7.  Nonstop! Inukai-kun: Inukai messed around with his teacher, Kenmochi, once. But ever since their contact vanished bit by bit. When she caught him staring at her she laughed, but he suddenly ran away. In pursuit they crash and Inukai get hurts. Once in the nurse's office they're love-affair returns...

8. Kota☆Tsun: Osamu doesn't get very good marks in school. When his tutor Maki comes over she is always mean to him and doesn't actually teach him anything, she just forces him to go over his material alone as she does her own thing. When Maki ends up falling asleep under the kotatsu, Osamu tries to get a little revenge and pokes around "down there" a little. When Maki wakes up and realizes what's going on, instead of killing the poor guy she decides to release a little sexual frustration...

9. Bloomer Mama Marvelous!!: A very short bonus story for the title story of Jingrock's previous compiled work Bloomer Mama...

10. In Season: A sweet story of a young couple having sex throughout a hot summer day in the country side...

**TAGS**
**MALE** big penis, glasses, schoolboy uniform, shotacon
**FEMALE** big ass, big breasts, bloomers, cunnilingus, defloration, fingering, glasses, hairy, paizuri, schoolgirl uniform, sister, stockings, sundress, swimsuit, tall girl, tanlines, teacher, tracksuit, tutor
**MIXED** incest
**OTHER** tankoubon, uncensored
